article_title: Aetna, More Bullish On Obamacare, Raises 2015 Profit Forecast

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Aetna (AET) chief executive officer Mark Bertolini said he now expects public exchange business under the Affordable Care Act to be an “attractive growth opportunity” that can generate a reasonable return for investors. In the past, Bertolini hasn’t been so bullish on the public exchanges, saying it was a break-even opportunity. [...]
